am:content.p: MArcomage (Multiplayer Arcomage) is an online card game inspired by original Arcomage. It's possible to play either against a human player or a computer player. Arcomage is a fantasy turn-based card game. This card game simulates an epic battle between two empires including features such as constructing new buildings, training troops and decimating the enemy empire with standard attacks or sneaky tactics such as intrigue or spells. There are similarities in gameplay, but there are differences in cards, game rules and victory conditions.

In order to play, the player must construct his own deck (there are three preconstructed decks available) and challenge other players. The battle begins as soon as the other side accepts. It is possible to chat with your opponent in game.

Advantage of this game is its turn based play style. It allows players to play as often as they like. For example you can play few turns a day, but if you want, you can play all the time, provided you find an opponent willing to play all day as well.

ul.li: Deck building - choose 45 unique cards to construct your own deck
Advanced deck building interface allows you to use multiple filters to find the desired cards quickly
Experience based leveling system lets you gain rank in the players ladder and provides you with gold (which can be used to unlock extra features)
Competitive achievements system makes possible to compare your playing skills with other players on a general scope
Discuss anything Arcomage related on our forum
Configure the layout to your best liking by selecting skins, uploading your avatar and other layout options such as background image or card layout

Advanced game mechanics, not available in original Arcomage
Multiple victory types allows you to apply different strategies
New game mechanics such as keywords, tokens, card summoning and many more
Different game modes allows you to play different variations of the game
Design your own cards and submit them for implementation
